briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety Study Of Short Ragweed Pollen Sublingual-Oral Immunotherapy
officialTitle: Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel Group Efficacy And Safety Trial Of Sublingual-Oral Immunotherapy (SLIT) In Adults With Allergic Rhinoconjunctivitis Caused By Ragweed Pollen
summary: The primary objective of this study is to demonstrate that SLIT administered pre-and co-seasonally is effective in reducing rhinoconjunctivitis symptoms during the entire short ragweed pollen season.

primaryOutcome.measure: Scores on a Scale [Net Average Combined Daily Rhinoconjunctivitis Symptom (RSS) and Medication Scores]
